prajathanthrawadi pakshaya wisuruwa hara ehi nayakayan ha samajikayan eksath jathika pakshayatath eekabaddha wipakshayatath dekada wi yame thaththwayak udawi thibe.prajathanthrawadi pakshaya wisuruwa hara ehi samajikayan siyalu dena eksath jathika pakshaye samajikathwaya gathayuthu bawata paksha nayaka fild marshal amathya sarath fonseka mahatha siya kruthyadhikari mandala samajikayanta awadharanaya kirimath samagama mema dekadawima aarambhawi thibe.

mema awasthawata karmantha ha wanija katayuthu amathya rishad badiyudin, mudal rajya amathya iran wikramarathna, parlimenthu manthrini wijayakala maheshawaran, maweyi senadhiraja yana mahathmahathmihu saha mudal ha janamadhya amathyansha lekam aacharya aar.ech.ech. samarathunga mahatha athulu amathyansha jyeshta niladharihu pirisak da ekwa sitiyaha.
samahara ratawala me darshakaya pahala agayak gena aththe sthri dushana sidunowana nisama nowa eewa mathupitata noena nisa ya.
eeta passe samaharu ammalage hitha rideyi kiyala ohe karaganna denawa.
daruwange dadi illima hethuwen polisiye niladharin wisinda ayata niwasata yana lesa kothek pawasuwa da ema illim aya piliganimata katayuthu kara naha.
methanata gos obama me mewalama ath hada balanna.
